Petunia, I'm not sure about her age, but I do know she's an adult. You know, I've had the chance to spend some time with her and I have to say, she's really grown into her role as a petunia. She seems confident and capable, which is impressive for someone of her age.

Petunia, I'm not surprised she's an adult - I mean, have you seen her? She's already got a full head of flowers and is taking care of herself. I think it's great that she's reached this stage in life, but at the same time, I do worry about how well she'll handle the changing seasons.
